article_metadata.news-keywords: Carolinas HealthCare System, Michael Tarwater, capital projects, third quarter
article_metadata.description: On Tuesday, Carolinas HealthCare System officials announced plans to spend $3 billion on capital projects as part of a six-year “reinvestment” plan.
